programme.title: 365 obiadów Mariety Mareckiej
programme.desc: Gospodyni programu podpowiada, skąd czerpać inspiracje na codzienne obiady. Marieta Marecka zaprezentuje szereg pomysłowych i prostych w przygotowaniu posiłków. Podpowie też, jak odpowiedzialnie podchodzić do gotowania. W każdym odcinku prowadząca zaprezentuje trzy nowe, często zaskakujące potrawy, które złożą się w gotowy plan na obiad dla całej rodziny. Marieta udzieli również wskazówek na temat tego, co i za ile najlepiej kupić, jakie składniki możemy zamieniać na tańsze oraz jak robić zakupy w sposób przemyślany. Swój udział w tworzeniu programu po raz pierwszy otrzymają również widzowie, którzy poprzez przesyłane przez siebie zdjęcia, prezentować będą zawartość lodówki oraz pomysł na to, co można ugotować z takich składników.

programme.title: 365 obiadów Mariety Mareckiej
programme.desc: Gospodyni programu podpowiada, skąd czerpać inspiracje na codzienne obiady. Marieta Marecka zaprezentuje szereg pomysłowych i prostych w przygotowaniu posiłków. Podpowie też, jak odpowiedzialnie podchodzić do gotowania. W każdym odcinku prowadząca zaprezentuje trzy nowe, często zaskakujące potrawy, które złożą się w gotowy plan na obiad dla całej rodziny. Marieta udzieli również wskazówek na temat tego, co i za ile najlepiej kupić, jakie składniki możemy zamieniać na tańsze oraz jak robić zakupy w sposób przemyślany. Swój udział w tworzeniu programu po raz pierwszy otrzymają również widzowie, którzy poprzez przesyłane przez siebie zdjęcia, prezentować będą zawartość lodówki oraz pomysł na to, co można ugotować z takich składników.

Podpowie też, jak odpowiedzialnie podchodzić do gotowania. W każdym odcinku prowadząca zaprezentuje trzy nowe, często zaskakujące potrawy, które złożą się w gotowy plan na obiad dla całej rodziny. Marieta udzieli również wskazówek na temat tego, co i za ile najlepiej kupić, jakie składniki możemy zamieniać na tańsze oraz jak robić zakupy w sposób przemyślany. Swój udział w tworzeniu programu po raz pierwszy otrzymają również widzowie, którzy poprzez przesyłane przez siebie zdjęcia, prezentować będą zawartość lodówki oraz pomysł na to, co można ugotować z takich składników.

programme.title: 365 obiadów Mariety Mareckiej
programme.desc: Gospodyni programu podpowiada, skąd czerpać inspiracje na codzienne obiady. Marieta Marecka zaprezentuje szereg pomysłowych i prostych w przygotowaniu posiłków. Podpowie też, jak odpowiedzialnie podchodzić do gotowania. W każdym odcinku prowadząca zaprezentuje trzy nowe, często zaskakujące potrawy, które złożą się w gotowy plan na obiad dla całej rodziny. Marieta udzieli również wskazówek na temat tego, co i za ile najlepiej kupić, jakie składniki możemy zamieniać na tańsze oraz jak robić zakupy w sposób przemyślany. Swój udział w tworzeniu programu po raz pierwszy otrzymają również widzowie, którzy poprzez przesyłane przez siebie zdjęcia, prezentować będą zawartość lodówki oraz pomysł na to, co można ugotować z takich składników.

programme.title: Tamtej nocy
programme.desc: Zuzanna Szwarc (Hanna Konarowska), mama kilkuletniej dziewczynki, pracuje jako kuratorka sztuki. Pewnego wieczoru widzi napad. Dwóch mężczyzna atakuje chłopaka. Zuza nie pozostaje obojętna i stara się go obronić. Kiedy na miejsce przybywa policja, to jednak ona, nie sprawcy pobicia, zostaje aresztowana.

credits.actor: Hanna Konarowska
Piotr Stramowski
Karina Kunkiewicz

programme.title: 60 kilo niczego
programme.desc: Zimny poranek w odkrywkowej kopalni kruszców. Krzysztof (Grzegorz Damięcki) zaczyna pierwszy dzień pracy na stanowisku kierownika. Wyraźnie nie pasuje on do środowiska pracowników fizycznych. W trosce o własną pozycję, zamierza trzymać dyscyplinę twardą ręką. Nagły wypadek, którego ofiarą staje się jeden z ukraińskich robotników, wystawia zasady moralne Krzysztofa na próbę. Zdaje on sobie sprawę z tego, że łatwo być stanowczym tylko w sprzyjających okolicznościach. Jednak trudno mu przeciwstawić się złu, kiedy w grę wchodzą dramatyczne konsekwencje.

credits.actor: Grzegorz Damięcki
Artem Manuilov
Andrzej Grabowski

programme.title: Spitsbergen
programme.desc: Magda (Magdalena Czerwińska), zawieszona ratowniczka medyczna, otrzymuje nagłe wezwanie. Oznacza to dla niej powrót do dramatycznych wydarzeń i ludzkich tragedii. Gdy opada poziom adrenaliny, kobieta przypomina sobie podróże na Spitsbergen - mroźną norweską wyspę na Morzu Arktycznym. To miejsce stało się dla niej powodem traumy, z którą do tej pory nie zdołała się uporać. Przerastają ją cudze nieszczęścia i własna przeszłość.

credits.actor: Magdalena Czerwińska
Marek Kossakowski
Marian Dziędziel

programme.title: Acid Rain
programme.desc: Młoda ucieka z domu jak najdalej od smutnej, bezbarwnej miejscowości. Szybko okazuje się, że podróż autostopem nie jest tak ekscytująca, jak się wydawało, kiedy znajduje się w środku nocy na obrzeżach postkomunistycznego miasta. Dziewczyna dostrzega na moście postać, która niebezpiecznie balansuje na barierce. Tak poznaje niezrównoważonego dziwaka Chudego. Oboje postanawiają na jakiś czas obrać taki sam kierunek podróży. Pod osłoną nocy snują się po mieście, w coraz dziwniejsze rejony, doświadczając niezwykłych emocji. Wkrótce między Młodą a Chudym tworzy się nienazwana więź. Całość oparta jest na płaszczyźnie psychodelicznej jak z narkotycznego transu.

programme.title: Wiki
programme.desc: Autystyczna Wiki (Kamila Kobic) jest ciekawa świata. Musi zmierzyć się z trudną rzeczywistością. Pewnego dnia spotyka Mateusza (Adam Bobik), fana autobusów warszawskiej komunikacji miejskiej, który wprowadza radość do jej szarego życia.

credits.actor: Kamila Kobic
Magdalena Kizinkiewicz
Adam Bobik

programme.title: Myszy i szczury
programme.desc: Dramatyczne losy małego Adasia (Miłosz Kwiecień), którego przykre doświadczenia sprzed lat odbijają się na psychice całej rodziny. Wzruszająca historia o bezgranicznej miłości, przeznaczeniu, poczuciu winy i ponoszeniu konsekwencji za swoje czyny.

credits.actor: Michał Krzywicki
Kacper Anuszewski
Rafał Gerlach
Grzegorz Damięcki, Andrzej Seweryn, Sylwia Juszczak

programme.title: Tata
programme.desc: Członkowie dwupokoleniowej rodziny próbują żyć ze świadomością o jej rozpadzie. Niektórzy starają się to akceptować i trwać w takiej rzeczywistości, a inni chcą się z niej wydostać. Liczne problemy, rozpadające się związki i rozwody negatywnie wpływają na stosunki międzyludzkie. Wszystko to odbija się na dzieciach, które w ten sposób tracą szansę na normalny rozwój. Przedstawiana historia widziana jest z perspektywy małego dziecka, obserwującego zachowania swoich rodziców. Rozgrywający się dramat ojca Janusza (Grzegorz Juchiewicz) uwidacznia bezsilność w bezwiednie zapoczątkowanej autodestrukcji.

credits.actor: Grzegorz Juchiewicz

programme.title: The Birdcatcher
W pułapce myśliwego
programme.desc: Directed by Ross Clarke. With Sarah-Sofie Boussnina, Arthur Hakalahti, Jakob Cedergren, Laura Birn. A Jewish girl Esther is forced to conceal her identity as a boy on a Nazi-Norwegian farm. Plotting her escape to Sweden, her daily challenge to keep her true identity a secret, leads to a series of choices and consequences.

programme.title: Wolne pokoje
programme.desc: Historia Zosi (Weronika Wachowska), która pod przymusem matki przyjeżdża na wakacje do starego, rodzinnego młyna, gdzie ma się nią opiekować ciotka Krysia (Olga Miłaszewska). Krewna jest dla dziewczynki niemiła, a okolica wydaje jej się przerażająca. Pewnego dnia przyjezdna wraz z nowym kolegą odkrywa tajemnicze drzwi, które są zamknięte od lat i pod żadnym pozorem nie wolno ich otwierać. Dzieci postanawiają złamać zasadę i sprawdzić, co się za nimi kryje. Obraz nakręcono w Barlinku.

programme.title: Metti la nonna in freezer
Babcia w zamrażarce

programme.desc:
The Art of War II: Betrayal: Directed by Josef Rusnak. With Wesley Snipes, Lochlyn Munro, Athena Karkanis, Winston Rekert. Agent Neil Shaw is called out of retirement and finds himself in the midst of a plot to assassinate several leading Senators with himself set-up to take the rap for a recent killing." Video Trailer from Sony Pictures Home Entertainment"},"datePublished":"2008-08-12","description":"Agent Neil Shaw is called out of retirement and finds himself in the midst of a plot to assassinate several leading Senators with himself set-up to take the rap for a recent killing.","keywords":"murder,corruption,betrayal,die hard scenario,martial arts training","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1233571/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"homecoming8"},"dateCreated":"2008-10-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Wesley Snipes Means No Budget These Days...","reviewBody":"Wesley Snipes is to this day still a qualified action-star, movies like Passenger 57, Murder at 1600 and the Blade Trilogy made him great. The Art Of War was also a decent action-flick which co-starred Michael Biehn(Terminator, Aliens, The Abyss). On the action-level, it certainly delivered with a great twist at the end (and some good action as well).

Art of War II co-stars Lochlyn Munroe, a comedy actor who has had some excellent roles in "Dead Man On Campus" and "Scary Movie". The story has nothing to do with the original, so it was purely a marketing-trick. Think of this as Snipes' former direct-to-DVD movies (Steven Seagal has some of these too) so the budget is limited, just like the acting, the story and so on. Like Seagal, Snipes is also years away from his glory-days. And you can tell.. A dull story, bad camera-work, lame characters and so on. 

You can skip this one, even if you love action-films. I still haven't seen The Marksman with Wesley Snipes, but judging by this painful mess, I am not going to bother. Watch Passenger 57 once again instead..","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3646,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.3},"duration":"PT1H43M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Czempion
programme.desc: Marian (Marek Siudym), starzejący się mistrz kolarstwa, pracuje jako stróż na złomowisku samochodów. Przytłacza go samotne życie na odludziu. Ulega pokusie i podejmuje próbę zmiany swojej sytuacji. Okazuje się jednak, że nie jest to łatwe w nieznanym mu wirtualnym świecie, rzeczywistości selfie czy miłości na sprzedaż.

credits.actor: Marek Siudym
Michał Piela
Maria Patykiewicz
Krzysztof Rogucki, Sylwia Gola, Wojciech Chorąży

programme.title: Leszy
programme.desc: Krzysiek, po dziesięciu latach nieobecności, zabiera swojego syna na polowanie. Mężczyzna poprzez wyprawę myśliwską chce odzyskać zaufanie syna i nadrobić stracony czas. Adrenalina, alkohol i miło spędzony czas sprawiają, że mężczyźni się do siebie zbliżają. Jednak niedojrzałość Krzysztofa prowadzi doprowadza do wielkiej tragedii.

credits.actor: Tadeusz Ratuszniak
Łukasz Gawroński
Dominika Sakowicz

programme.title: Wiki
programme.desc: Autystyczna Wiki (Kamila Kobic) jest ciekawa świata. Musi zmierzyć się z trudną rzeczywistością. Pewnego dnia spotyka Mateusza (Adam Bobik), fana autobusów warszawskiej komunikacji miejskiej, który wprowadza radość do jej szarego życia.

credits.actor: Kamila Kobic
Magdalena Kizinkiewicz
Adam Bobik

programme.title: Spitsbergen
programme.desc: Magda (Magdalena Czerwińska), zawieszona ratowniczka medyczna, otrzymuje nagłe wezwanie. Oznacza to dla niej powrót do dramatycznych wydarzeń i ludzkich tragedii. Gdy opada poziom adrenaliny, kobieta przypomina sobie podróże na Spitsbergen - mroźną norweską wyspę na Morzu Arktycznym. To miejsce stało się dla niej powodem traumy, z którą do tej pory nie zdołała się uporać. Przerastają ją cudze nieszczęścia i własna przeszłość.

credits.actor: Magdalena Czerwińska
Marek Kossakowski
Marian Dziędziel
Joanna Kulig, Adam Woronowicz, Alan Tybulczuk

programme.title: 60 kilo niczego
programme.desc: Zimny poranek w odkrywkowej kopalni kruszców. Krzysztof (Grzegorz Damięcki) zaczyna pierwszy dzień pracy na stanowisku kierownika. Wyraźnie nie pasuje on do środowiska pracowników fizycznych. W trosce o własną pozycję, zamierza trzymać dyscyplinę twardą ręką. Nagły wypadek, którego ofiarą staje się jeden z ukraińskich robotników, wystawia zasady moralne Krzysztofa na próbę. Zdaje on sobie sprawę z tego, że łatwo być stanowczym tylko w sprzyjających okolicznościach. Jednak trudno mu przeciwstawić się złu, kiedy w grę wchodzą dramatyczne konsekwencje.

credits.actor: Grzegorz Damięcki
Artem Manuilov
Andrzej Grabowski
Grzegorz Damięcki, Andrzej Seweryn, Sylwia Juszczak

programme.title: Transfer kosmicznej energii
programme.desc: Radek jest ambitnym coachem motywacyjnym. Robi karierę w korporacji. Mężczyzna traci pewność siebie w momencie, gdy uczestniczy w bójce w knajpie. Decyduje się na nielegalne techniki hakowania mózgu. Niestety rezultaty są inne, niż się spodziewał.

credits.actor: Adam Turczyk
Dorota Androsz
Tomasz Więcek

programme.title: C'est tout pour moi
Stand Up Girl
programme.desc: C'est tout pour moi: Directed by Ludovic Colbeau-Justin, Nawell Madani. With Nawell Madani, François Berléand, Mimoun Benabderrahmane, Leyla Doriane. Lila had a dream to become a dancer since she's a little. She went to Paris trying to make her dream come true. But soon she found out it's not what she thought, her dream was disillusioned. programme.title: Wolne pokoje
programme.desc: Historia Zosi (Weronika Wachowska), która pod przymusem matki przyjeżdża na wakacje do starego, rodzinnego młyna, gdzie ma się nią opiekować ciotka Krysia (Olga Miłaszewska). Krewna jest dla dziewczynki niemiła, a okolica wydaje jej się przerażająca. Pewnego dnia przyjezdna wraz z nowym kolegą odkrywa tajemnicze drzwi, które są zamknięte od lat i pod żadnym pozorem nie wolno ich otwierać. Dzieci postanawiają złamać zasadę i sprawdzić, co się za nimi kryje. Obraz nakręcono w Barlinku.

credits.actor: Weronika Wachowska
Olga Miłaszewska

programme.desc: Directed by Jakub Radej. With Stanislaw Linowski, Zuzanna Zielinska, Tomasz Schuchardt, Marta Scislowicz. Poland, 1982, the politically heated days of communist martial law. programme.title: Córka
programme.desc: W dniu szesnastych urodzin do Kamili (Gabriela Chojecka) przyjeżdża ojciec, Piotr (Adam Cywka). Niespodziewanie zastaje córkę w kałuży krwi. Dziewczyna nie chce z nim rozmawiać. Roztrzęsiony ojciec udaje się po pomoc na policję oraz do adwokata, lecz nikt nie chce mu pomóc. W końcu postanawia wszcząć prywatne śledztwo.

programme.title: When Billie Beat Bobby
Kiedy Billie pokonała Bobby'ego
programme.desc: When Billie Beat Bobby: Directed by Jane Anderson. With Holly Hunter, Ron Silver, Matt Letscher, Bob Gunton. The historic 1973 tennis match between middle-aged champion Bobby Riggs (Ron Silver) and young feminist Billie Jean King (Holly Hunter)." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0258446/","name":"When Billie Beat Bobby","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA4NDA4OTg3N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODI3OTkyMQ@@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"PG","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Sport"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000456/","name":"Holly Hunter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0798779/","name":"Ron Silver"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0504762/","name":"Matt Letscher"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0026862/","name":"Jane Anderson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0165580/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0026862/","name":"Jane Anderson"}],"datePublished":"2001-04-16","description":"The historic 1973 tennis match between middle-aged champion Bobby Riggs (Ron Silver) and young feminist Billie Jean King (Holly Hunter).","keywords":"las vegas nevada,slapstick comedy,title directed by female,women's liberation,champion","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0258446/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jacketeer2"},"dateCreated":"2001-04-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"ABC got a bargain.","reviewBody":"This is one of the best TV movies to come along in years, maybe longer. As usual, Holly Hunter turns in a wonderful performance as Billie Jean King (both as the person and the tennis player). But the real shocker here is the writing and directing. "When Billie beat Bobby" has a wonderful sense of style that rarely, if ever, is available for free in the comfort of your home. It makes use of visual grain, hand held camera work, jump cuts (when was the last time you saw a jump cut on TV), and non-diagetic visuals. This does not deserve to be on TV and it does not deserve to be called a movie. I would have loved to see this film in a theater and ABC got their luckiest break since "Millionaire." From an artistic standpoint, seeing this in a theatrical release would have taken a great TV movie and turned it into one of the year's best films. From a business standpoint, someone would have made a lot more money if this was on the big screen. I don't know if this will be availiable on video one day (or in theaters) but if you ever get a chance to see it then do. It really harkens back to the TV movies"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":570,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

As usual, Holly Hunter turns in a wonderful performance as Billie Jean King (both as the person and the tennis player). But the real shocker here is the writing and directing. "When Billie beat Bobby" has a wonderful sense of style that rarely, if ever, is available for free in the comfort of your home. programme.desc:
Momentum: Directed by James Seale. With Louis Gossett Jr., Teri Hatcher, Grayson McCouch, Michael Massee. A man with telekinetic abilities meets a group of people with similair powers." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0316272/","name":"Momentum","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTI0MDY3MjIzNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjAxNTAzMQ@@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Drama","Sci-Fi"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001283/","name":"Louis Gossett Jr."},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000159/","name":"Teri Hatcher"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0566651/","name":"Grayson McCouch"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0780530/","name":"James Seale"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017447/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0102301/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0007172/","name":"Deverin Karol"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Momentum (2003)","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3977885721","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTE0ODIwYzEtZjJjZS00M2JhLWJmODctN2U3MTE4YzRkNWRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTE0ODIwYzEtZjJjZS00M2JhLWJmODctN2U3MTE4YzRkNWRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Momentum"},"datePublished":"2003-07-26","description":"A man with telekinetic abilities meets a group of people with similair powers.","keywords":"fbi federal bureau of investigation,fbi agent,sawed off shotgun,neck breaking,elevator","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0316272/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jrgreenmd-1"},"dateCreated":"2003-07-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Another Sci-Fi Channel Cookie Cutter Film","reviewBody":"The films of the Science Fiction Channel ( Sci-Fi Channel ) have become boringly predictable. The seem low on budget, originality, and plot.

In this creation the government is out to get a bunch of telekinetics and recruits a poor soul by devious means to help. There is plenty of over worked recycled twists on evil government organization theme. black coats, shadows, short meaningless lines make these one dimensional cartoons.

Daniel Dae Kim stands out as a good actor in a small role. He brings a bit of the style of his "Angel" character to the role. It is hard to miss the link that his "Crusade" character was a telepath and this is a film on telekinetics. Was this a Sci-Fi casting move to try and draw fans from the other show? Who knows. Thankfully he is a decent actor and a pleasure to watch.

The movie is definitely low budget. It reflects The Sci-Fi Channels current model of Canadian location, few well known characters, few effects, and woefully terrible plot and character development. One would think they believe science fiction fans will view anything labeled "scifi."

If you want a good telekinesis movie, check out "the Fury" ( 1978).","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":806,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.7},"duration":"PT1H28M"}</script><metacontent="

When space pirates hijack them, 5000 disintegrator robots are found in the cargo." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0120199/","name":"Space Truckers","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjZkMzkxMzgtNmZhMC00ODc3LTllMmYtMTRlODhiZjBjOWU1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Adventure","Comedy","Sci-Fi"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0516385/","name":"Tim Loane"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0064155/","name":"Ian Beattie"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0288260/","name":"Olwen Fouéré"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002340/","name":"Stuart Gordon"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0045569/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0078216/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0156955/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1949279/","name":"Ted Mann"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002340/","name":"Stuart Gordon"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Space Truckers","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2610102553","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDlmNDRiMDgtYmVmNy00MGU1LWI2MGMtYTZmMWMzYTBhODVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDlmNDRiMDgtYmVmNy00MGU1LWI2MGMtYTZmMWMzYTBhODVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Sterling Home Entertainment"},"description":"A space trucker and his cute fiancee are on their way from a space station to Earth with an unknown cargo. When space pirates hijack them, 5000 disintegrator robots are found in the cargo.","keywords":"b movie,robot,killer robot,die hard scenario,bare chested male","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0120199/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"raegan_butcher"},"dateCreated":"2006-04-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"Gonzo Space Opera,","reviewBody":"Like Stuart Gordon's other venture into science fiction territory, the underrated and ill-fated ROBOT JOX, this is a nifty little film that was plagued by production difficulties and failed to find a theatrical distributor, which is a shame because its quite an enjoyable viewing experience. Everyone in the cast has fun in this , with Dennis Hopper delivering some unexpected and funny bits of dialog, Debi Mazar and Stephen Dorff providing reliable 2nd banana support and Charles Dance having the time of his life with his horny half-metal madman. This Excellent DVD offers a chance to see this little sleeper in a great looking print with a fascinating and funny commentary by the Director. This film delivers exactly what its titles proclaims.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":6870,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.3},"duration":"PT1H35M"}</script><metacontent="

You're letting in a draft!","reviewBody":"Tom (Kevin Bacon) has hypnotized by his sister-in-law, played by Illeana Douglas, and from then on his life's a little....well, weird. He sees a ghost of a disappeared girl, and he's not the only one - his young son's been seeing the spectre for weeks. What unfolds after that is that Tom slips further and further into imminent madness. His wife Maggie (Kathryn Erbe) can't fathom his insanity, and it's driving her up the wall, as both of the men in her life are increasingly distant and non-communicative. So what happened to Tom when he was under hypnosis? His sister-in-law claims there's a door in everyone's mind that's never been opened, and it sure looks like Tom's door is wide open, with a big neon sign over it, inviting him to run through with abandon. What's behind all of this freakiness? There's a mystery afoot, but it turns out to be a little more standard and predictable than one would hope with the solid premise. Can't fault the actors, though - this is an unusual role for Bacon, who here comes off as a tough, strong, blue-collar kind of guy - he and his family are close to what one might call white trash, but they're never portrayed as being mean-spirited or hateful. This is just one of those cases where weird stuff happens to nice folk, kind of like the clan in "Poltergeist."\n\nSo this is a stylish psychological/supernatural thriller with game performances by a capable cast. It's watchable and full of chills, but the ending's a little pat.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":76693,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"duration":"PT1H39M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Carnage Park
Park makabry
programme.desc:
Carnage Park: Directed by Mickey Keating. With Ashley Bell, Pat Healy, James Landry Hébert, Michael Villar. Part crime caper gone awry, part survival horror film, this 1970s set thriller depicts a harrowing fight for survival after a pair of wannabe crooks botch a bank heist and flee into the desert, where they inexplicably stumble upon Carnage Park, a remote stretch of wilderness occupied by a psychotic ex-military sniper." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4335650/","name":"Carnage Park","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE3MTA2MTQ0Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzkxNTAwOTE@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Action","Crime","Horror"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0068042/","name":"Ashley Bell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0372366/","name":"Pat Healy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2566469/","name":"James Landry Hébert"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4806266/","name":"Mickey Keating"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0497026/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4806266/","name":"Mickey Keating"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1236514585","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg0NDY0MDI2OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjk3ODIyOTE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg0NDY0MDI2OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjk3ODIyOTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"It's 1978 and a bank robbery gone wrong leaves Vivian the hostage of two criminals on the run. But things go from bad to off-the-rails berserk when she and her captors wind up on the sun-baked desert outpost of a deranged ex-military sniper, who ensnares them in his deadly game of cat and mouse."},"datePublished":"2016-07-01","description":"Part crime caper gone awry, part survival horror film, this 1970s set thriller depicts a harrowing fight for survival after a pair of wannabe crooks botch a bank heist and flee into the desert, where they inexplicably stumble upon Ca","keywords":"survival,game of death,escape,psychopath,psycho killer","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4335650/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"peterp-450-298716"},"dateCreated":"2016-07-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"A nutcase hiding in the desert with a sniper rifle. Sounds fascinating. The end result wasn't as fascinating.","reviewBody":""Brothers burn faster when they're burning together." 

The only positive thing about this film was Pat Healy as the crazy ex-marine Wyatt Moss, who set up his own personal amusement park somewhere in the bone-dry desert in California where he lures lost backpackers and hunts them down as a real psychotic hunter. He gratefully uses his talent as a sniper during these chases. The few times he speaks in this movie, show that he's ready for the nuthouse. Especially the dialogue with his brother, Sheriff Moss (Alan Ruck), is a memorable moment with that intonation and those facial expressions. Wyatt gave me the chills here, acting as a real psychopath. Just because of this scene, I'm planning to watch some more films with Healy playing in it.

I also thought that the sometimes eerie soundtrack and sound clips reverberating from the megaphones weren't so bad. They emphasized the insane mind of Wyatt. But otherwise this was a meaningless crime film, starring a madman fascinated by religion, who has his own safari park where victims try to survive. Thus a typical survival film. The last victim here is Vivian (Ashley Bell). She was kidnapped by two layabouts who tried to rob a bank and ended up in Carnage Park. It isn't very original and to be honest, there isn't happening that much essentially. It's during her stumbling flight that Vivian discovers other victims. And surely you can expect some fragments that are similar to those in other famous horror movies.

The thing that amazes me every time, is the stupidity of the main character. When you take matters into your own hand, make damn sure you do it thoroughly. Such a madman wouldn't get a second chance with me. But no, Wyatt with his gas mask (which reminded me of a CD cover from "Therapy?") resurfaces once again and the cat and mouse game restarts. And a cat could well have an advantage in this game, because it was largely pitch dark in this film. Several times I checked if the power went down, because in the end I couldn't see Jack sh*t most of the time. Also, the attempt to emulate the feel of a 70's movie wasn't really successful.

Actually, you can compare this with Mickey Keating's previous creation "Pod". Also, a so-called horror with potential. Good intentions are clearly present and there are also some positive aspects can be seen, but ultimately it's all vague and disappointing. Even downright violence and bloody fragments can't prevent it's becoming pretty boring and tedious halfway. Not to mention the announcement that this film is based once again on true facts. That won't make it an exciting movie, unfortunately.

More reviews here : http://bit.ly/1KIdQMT","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3315,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.9},"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

A man with telekinetic abilities meets a group of people with similair powers." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0316272/","name":"Momentum","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTI0MDY3MjIzNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjAxNTAzMQ@@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Drama","Sci-Fi"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001283/","name":"Louis Gossett Jr."},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000159/","name":"Teri Hatcher"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0566651/","name":"Grayson McCouch"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0780530/","name":"James Seale"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017447/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0102301/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0007172/","name":"Deverin Karol"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Momentum (2003)","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3977885721","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTE0ODIwYzEtZjJjZS00M2JhLWJmODctN2U3MTE4YzRkNWRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTE0ODIwYzEtZjJjZS00M2JhLWJmODctN2U3MTE4YzRkNWRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Momentum"},"datePublished":"2003-07-26","description":"A man with telekinetic abilities meets a group of people with similair powers.","keywords":"fbi federal bureau of investigation,fbi agent,sawed off shotgun,neck breaking,elevator","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0316272/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jrgreenmd-1"},"dateCreated":"2003-07-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Another Sci-Fi Channel Cookie Cutter Film","reviewBody":"The films of the Science Fiction Channel ( Sci-Fi Channel ) have become boringly predictable. The seem low on budget, originality, and plot.

In this creation the government is out to get a bunch of telekinetics and recruits a poor soul by devious means to help. There is plenty of over worked recycled twists on evil government organization theme. black coats, shadows, short meaningless lines make these one dimensional cartoons.

Daniel Dae Kim stands out as a good actor in a small role. He brings a bit of the style of his "Angel" character to the role. It is hard to miss the link that his "Crusade" character was a telepath and this is a film on telekinetics. Was this a Sci-Fi casting move to try and draw fans from the other show? Who knows. Thankfully he is a decent actor and a pleasure to watch.

The movie is definitely low budget. It reflects The Sci-Fi Channels current model of Canadian location, few well known characters, few effects, and woefully terrible plot and character development. One would think they believe science fiction fans will view anything labeled "scifi."

If you want a good telekinesis movie, check out "the Fury" ( 1978).","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":806,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.7},"duration":"PT1H28M"}</script><metacontent="

When space pirates hijack them, 5000 disintegrator robots are found in the cargo.","keywords":"b movie,robot,killer robot,die hard scenario,bare chested male","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0120199/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"raegan_butcher"},"dateCreated":"2006-04-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"Gonzo Space Opera,","reviewBody":"Like Stuart Gordon's other venture into science fiction territory, the underrated and ill-fated ROBOT JOX, this is a nifty little film that was plagued by production difficulties and failed to find a theatrical distributor, which is a shame because its quite an enjoyable viewing experience. Everyone in the cast has fun in this , with Dennis Hopper delivering some unexpected and funny bits of dialog, Debi Mazar and Stephen Dorff providing reliable 2nd banana support and Charles Dance having the time of his life with his horny half-metal madman. This Excellent DVD offers a chance to see this little sleeper in a great looking print with a fascinating and funny commentary by the Director. This film delivers exactly what its titles proclaims.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":6870,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.3},"duration":"PT1H35M"}</script><metacontent="

You're letting in a draft!","reviewBody":"Tom (Kevin Bacon) has hypnotized by his sister-in-law, played by Illeana Douglas, and from then on his life's a little....well, weird. He sees a ghost of a disappeared girl, and he's not the only one - his young son's been seeing the spectre for weeks. What unfolds after that is that Tom slips further and further into imminent madness. His wife Maggie (Kathryn Erbe) can't fathom his insanity, and it's driving her up the wall, as both of the men in her life are increasingly distant and non-communicative. So what happened to Tom when he was under hypnosis? His sister-in-law claims there's a door in everyone's mind that's never been opened, and it sure looks like Tom's door is wide open, with a big neon sign over it, inviting him to run through with abandon. What's behind all of this freakiness? There's a mystery afoot, but it turns out to be a little more standard and predictable than one would hope with the solid premise. Can't fault the actors, though - this is an unusual role for Bacon, who here comes off as a tough, strong, blue-collar kind of guy - he and his family are close to what one might call white trash, but they're never portrayed as being mean-spirited or hateful. This is just one of those cases where weird stuff happens to nice folk, kind of like the clan in "Poltergeist."\n\nSo this is a stylish psychological/supernatural thriller with game performances by a capable cast. It's watchable and full of chills, but the ending's a little pat.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":76693,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"duration":"PT1H39M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Van Helsing
Van Helsing
programme.desc:
Van Helsing: Directed by Stephen Sommers. With Hugh Jackman, Kate Beckinsale, Richard Roxburgh, David Wenham. The famed monster hunter is sent to Transylvania to stop Count Dracula, who is using Dr. Frankenstein's research and a werewolf for nefarious purposes." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0338526/","name":"Van Helsing","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODRmY2NhNDItOWViNi00OTIyLTk3YjYtYzY0YTFlMDg1YzQ0L2ltYWdlL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Fantasy"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0413168/","name":"Hugh Jackman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000295/","name":"Kate Beckinsale"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0746896/","name":"Richard Roxburgh"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0814085/","name":"Stephen Sommers"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0086885/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017390/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0814085/","name":"Stephen Sommers"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"What Roles Has Hugh Jackman Been Considered For?","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi585612825","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2Y2ZWZlNzQtMzhlOS00ZWMzLTk5YjUtNWJiNDI0NzNkYmM2XkEyXkFqcGdeQW1yb2Njbw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2Y2ZWZlNzQtMzhlOS00ZWMzLTk5YjUtNWJiNDI0NzNkYmM2XkEyXkFqcGdeQW1yb2Njbw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Hugh Jackman is best known for Wolverine, but he wasn't the first actor offered the role. He was, however, offered a few OTHER superhero and a super-spy roles later in his career."},"datePublished":"2004-06-09","description":"The famed monster hunter is sent to Transylvania to stop Count Dracula, who is using Dr. Frankenstein's research and a werewolf for nefarious purposes.","keywords":"werewolf,van helsing,dracula,vampire,creature","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0338526/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"rdatsun"},"dateCreated":"2005-01-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"It may have been corny, it may have have overused its CGI. But, hell, I loved it anyway!","reviewBody":"Yeah, I know this isn't a masterpiece of cinema and I can already tell half this nation's populace hates it despite a good run at the box office last summer. But still I went into this movie just looking for a good time (that and am a huge fan of old school monster films) and thats what I got. For the uptight and so called expert critics, let me spell it out for you: ITS A POPCORN MOVIE! OF COURSE EVERYTHING GOING TO BLOWN UP TO THE MAX AND GO OVER THE TOP! IF YOU CAN'T UNDERSTAND THIS, THEN DON'T CLAIM YOU DO AND BASH A FILM BECAUSE OF IT! *Ahem* alright on to my review.

Plot: Helsing and his assistant, a frair named Carl, are sent to Translvaynia to protect the last of a gypsy family from being stuck in purgatory due to a curse Dracula put on them. In the process however Helsing must also stop Drac's plan of engulfing the world in darkness all the while battling his minions. Throw in a plot device involving Frankenstein's monster and you have a pretty cool adventure brewing.

I'll admit for a movie that suppose to be about Helsing. They kinda dropped the ball on the story. There's way too much emphasis on the gypsy girl rather him and they don't flesh out his back story about his lost memory and his supposed history with Dracula. Also the movie has a few nonsense parts (the talk with the creepy undertaker) which kinda slows down the film a bit. But still the movie stays on a linear path and the set-ups up to confrontations are well done. Not to mention the confrontation themselves even if some are a little silly (ballroom scene (though a good homage to the Fearless Vampire Killers), the fight with the last bride, Igor and Dracula himself). Yes their CGI laden but I don't care, its a supernatural movie after all. So what better way to do them.

The actors seem very comfortable with their roles and looks to be having a great time. Extra props go out to the dude who played Frankenstien's monster, I was really feeling for him. Easily one of the best characters in the movie.

Add to that some excellent backdrops and clothes to which the film really draws you into its 19th century world. Yes the movie is full of flaws but it only for fun and only wants to entertain to which it success in spades. If you don't like it, well fine. But for all who love a good popcorn flick or a fan of old school monsters, you can look no further. Van Helsing is just the ticket for a simple good time.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":249149,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"duration":"PT2H11M"}</script><metacontent="

minister","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2493486/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ma-cortes"},"dateCreated":"2018-06-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Yet another rendition freely based on 47 Ronin , it deals with a feudal lord : Morgan Freeman and his soldiers captained by Clive Owen .","reviewBody":"Although not mentioned , the story results to be a remake of the the 47 Ronin and and it boasts a splendid cast . it is based on the Japanese folk legend . Middle Age , an Europen country , this is an epic chronicling an ancient legend .As a group of military led by Clive Owen set out to avenge the dishonor and death of their master at the hands of a ruthless , corrupt Prime Minister, Aksel Hennie . Commanded by a fallen knight who was tricked into commiting an ominous execution , he is called Raiden ,and along with their knights rise against a nasty , sadistic ruler to avenge their Master , as every battle needs a hero . They are banished and isolated but Raiden rallies again his bunch and reforces the team . As their entire destiny lies in the hands of one knight .His threatened people made him a leader , the empire made him a renegade , history made him a hero .

Features noisy action , strong rivalry , thrills , emotion , intense drama and a lot of sword-play . It is made big scale with some breathtaking and spectacular battles such as the final assault on the impregnable fortress . The plot is ordinary and simple , as a rough emperor : Payman Maadi sentences a powerful feudal lord who is condemned to death and then his soldiers become Ronin : warriors with no master , and planning a scheme to revenge their dishonored Master , subsequently seeking vengeance , justice and honor. The appropriate photography is generously laden with views of of palaces and castles as well as paronamic vistas .The action is well paced with adequate interpretation, though the story occassionaly drags for an uneven script by Dove Sussman . It is full of good values as bravery, knighthood, honour , comradeship , sacrifice and redemption . Cast and support cast is frankly fine , such as Owen , Freeman , Aksel Hennie , Ayelet Zurer as faithfull wife , Ihara as an upright knight and Cliff Curtis as btave lieutenant .



Ii contains a colorful and evocative photography shot in Czech Republic , though sometimes dark cinematography by the great Spanish cameraman Antonio Riestra who has photographed nice films as Mama , The bachelors , Katmandu , Lidice , Black bread, Stephanie , Eloise ,and The face of love . Rousing and thrilling musical score accompanying perfectly to action from Ramgotra and Martin Tillman.The motion picture turns out to be a British/South Korea coproduction well directed by Kazuaki Kiriya who has made a few movies as Goeman and Cassehern

another rendition freely based on 47 Ronin , it deals with a feudal lord : Morgan Freeman and his soldiers captained by Clive Owen .","reviewBody":"Although not mentioned , the story results to be a remake of the the 47 Ronin and and it boasts a splendid cast . it is based on the Japanese folk legend . Middle Age , an Europen country , this is an epic chronicling an ancient legend .As a group of military led by Clive Owen set out to avenge the dishonor and death of their master at the hands of a ruthless , corrupt Prime Minister, Aksel Hennie . Commanded by a fallen knight who was tricked into commiting an ominous execution , he is called Raiden ,and along with their knights rise against a nasty , sadistic ruler to avenge their Master , as every battle needs a hero . They are banished and isolated but Raiden rallies again his bunch and reforces the team . As their entire destiny lies in the hands of one knight .His threatened people made him a leader , the empire made him a renegade , history made him a hero .

Features noisy action , strong rivalry , thrills , emotion , intense drama and a lot of sword-play . It is made big scale with some breathtaking and spectacular battles such as the final assault on the impregnable fortress . The plot is ordinary and simple , as a rough emperor : Payman Maadi sentences a powerful feudal lord who is condemned to death and then his soldiers become Ronin : warriors with no master , and planning a scheme to revenge their dishonored Master , subsequently seeking vengeance , justice and honor. The appropriate photography is generously laden with views of of palaces and castles as well as paronamic vistas .The action is well paced with adequate interpretation, though the story occassionaly drags for an uneven script by Dove Sussman . It is full of good values as bravery, knighthood, honour , comradeship , sacrifice and redemption . Cast and support cast is frankly fine , such as Owen , Freeman , Aksel Hennie , Ayelet Zurer as faithfull wife , Ihara as an upright knight and Cliff Curtis as btave lieutenant .

An imprisoned drug kingpin offers a huge cash reward to anyone that can break him out of police custody, and only the L.A.P.D.'s Special Weapons and Tactics team can prevent it." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0257076/","name":"S.W.A.T.","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmIxYTVmMDEtNWU5NS00MWJhLWJjNmQtNjkxNWI3NmY4MzJlL2ltYWdlL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Crime"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000168/","name":"Samuel L. Jackson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0268199/","name":"Colin Farrell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735442/","name":"Michelle Rodriguez"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0424800/","name":"Clark Johnson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011134/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0084122/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0358842/","name":"Robert Hamner"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0593856/","name":"Ron Mita"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0572151/","name":"Jim McClain"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"S.W.A.T.","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2894070041","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDMzMGY1NGYtNWQ0Ni00NTU4LTlmNTYtMDZiNWJmMmI3NTk1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDMzMGY1NGYtNWQ0Ni00NTU4LTlmNTYtMDZiNWJmMmI3NTk1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Columbia Tristar"},"datePublished":"2003-09-24","description":"An imprisoned drug kingpin offers a huge cash reward to anyone that can break him out of police custody, and only the L.A.P.D.'s Special Weapons and Tactics team can prevent it.","keywords":"female police officer,swat team,police,crime boss,police sergeant","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0257076/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"grahamsj3"},"dateCreated":"2004-04-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"Underrated","reviewBody":"I haven't read the comments of others, so I'm not sure why it's rated so low. This is a pretty decent yarn with some good action and suspense in it. The story is almost believable. A drug dealer is detained by the Police and offers $100 million to anyone who can spring him. The offer is taken up by several people and the Los Angeles Police Department finds itself outgunned. Their only hope is the newly formed SWAT team, headed by Samuel L. Jackson. The whole SWAT thing is new and no one likes it. While, today, many people still don't like the idea of SWAT teams, they are now a part of the law enforcement landscape. It's too "Military" for most people. The film shows the build up and some of the training of the SWAT team, and their duel with the bad guys in the end. It kept my attention and I found it entertaining. And isn't that what the industry is all about? I gave it a 7.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":140194,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"duration":"PT1H57M"}</script><metacontent="

The American military must chase the monster across the city to stop it before it reproduces." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0120685/","name":"Godzilla","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjFlOTI2OGQtMzg0YS00ZGE4LTkwMjEtZDUzYThlOTU5YjQ5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Sci-Fi","Thriller"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000111/","name":"Matthew Broderick"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000606/","name":"Jean Reno"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001623/","name":"Maria Pitillo"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000386/","name":"Roland Emmerich"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0071034/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0053780/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0195567/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002041/","name":"Dean Devlin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000386/","name":"Roland Emmerich"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0254645/","name":"Ted Elliott"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Godzilla (1998)","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3970236697","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjM5YmQ2MjEtNjVlMi00YTcxLWE4MTAtOTRmMDJhNjcwYTQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjM5YmQ2MjEtNjVlMi00YTcxLWE4MTAtOTRmMDJhNjcwYTQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Pre, "May 20""},"datePublished":"1998-05-20","description":"French nuclear tests irradiate an iguana into a giant monster that heads off to New York City. The American military must chase the monster across the city to stop it before it reproduces.","keywords":"giant monster,iguana,military,giant footprint,running for your life","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0120685/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"tonymurphylee"},"dateCreated":"2008-05-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"I thought this was fun. I don't know why people whine about it so much.","reviewBody":"Well, being a longtime fan of the GODZILLA/GOJIRA films as a youngster, I remember seeing this with great anticipation. I, unlike a lot of people, was not at all disappointed. This film was exactly what I was hoping it would be at the time. Sure, it certainly wasn't as charming or as funny as the films I loved as a kid, but it was a lot of fun. I loved the action scenes, the look of the monster was crazy to me, and the plot was simple enough for a first time viewer to get right into. Seeing it again 10 years later, I had the same reaction. My opinion of this film hasn't changed one bit. I guess everybody's complaints stem from how this has no charm or any kind of attempt at being cute or original. I guess that's understandable, but I still don't see what everybody's problem is. This was supposed to be a fun, exciting, and action packed thrill ride. That's all it is, no more, no less. I personally think that it succeeds at what it achieved to be perfectly. Matthew Broderick may not exactly be an action hero, but his character sure was quirky and funny. Jean Reno was as good as usual."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":185982,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"duration":"PT2H19M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Godzilla: Directed by Roland Emmerich. With Matthew Broderick, Jean Reno, Maria Pitillo, Hank Azaria. The American military must chase the monster across the city to stop it before it reproduces." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0120685/","name":"Godzilla","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjFlOTI2OGQtMzg0YS00ZGE4LTkwMjEtZDUzYThlOTU5YjQ5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Sci-Fi","Thriller"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000111/","name":"Matthew Broderick"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000606/","name":"Jean Reno"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001623/","name":"Maria Pitillo"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000386/","name":"Roland Emmerich"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0071034/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0053780/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0195567/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002041/","name":"Dean Devlin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000386/","name":"Roland Emmerich"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0254645/","name":"Ted Elliott"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Godzilla (1998)","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3970236697","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjM5YmQ2MjEtNjVlMi00YTcxLWE4MTAtOTRmMDJhNjcwYTQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjM5YmQ2MjEtNjVlMi00YTcxLWE4MTAtOTRmMDJhNjcwYTQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Pre, "May 20""},"datePublished":"1998-05-20","description":"French nuclear tests irradiate an iguana into a giant monster that heads off to New York City. The American military must chase the monster across the city to stop it before it reproduces.","keywords":"giant monster,iguana,military,giant footprint,running for your life","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0120685/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"tonymurphylee"},"dateCreated":"2008-05-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"I thought this was fun. I don't know why people whine about it so much.","reviewBody":"Well, being a longtime fan of the GODZILLA/GOJIRA films as a youngster, I remember seeing this with great anticipation. I, unlike a lot of people, was not at all disappointed. This film was exactly what I was hoping it would be at the time. Sure, it certainly wasn't as charming or as funny as the films I loved as a kid, but it was a lot of fun. I loved the action scenes, the look of the monster was crazy to me, and the plot was simple enough for a first time viewer to get right into. Seeing it again 10 years later, I had the same reaction. My opinion of this film hasn't changed one bit. I guess everybody's complaints stem from how this has no charm or any kind of attempt at being cute or original. I guess that's understandable, but I still don't see what everybody's problem is. This was supposed to be a fun, exciting, and action packed thrill ride. That's all it is, no more, no less. I personally think that it succeeds at what it achieved to be perfectly. Matthew Broderick may not exactly be an action hero, but his character sure was quirky and funny. Jean Reno was as good as usual."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":185982,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"duration":"PT2H19M"}</script><metacontent="
